title: Ordering histograms based on proportion above mean

content.question: For the three histograms above, which of the following correctly orders the histograms from the one with the smallest proportion of data above its mean to the one with the largest proportion of data above its mean?

choices.label: All three histograms have the same proportion of data above their respective means.

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Compare distributions or relative positions of points within a distribution.
